Dating: PINUDJEM II (not before); HIGH-PRIESTS AND PRIEST-KINGS OF THEBES
Technique: PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL; BURNED; STUCCO; VARNISHED
Name: Mummiform shabti for Pe-de-Amun
Description: This squat mummiform shabti is made of painted pottery with varnish, probably to imitate faience. The details and the text were added in black paint.
